sys_email_canned_message.body:
Disclaimers:

Note: Please be aware that responding to this email after the ticket has been resolved will not reopen the ticket for further assistance. If you have any further inquiries or require additional assistance, we kindly request that you initiate a new email correspondence to Service Parts Customer Service <SPCustomerService@Navistar.com>. Doing so will enable us to efficiently address your new query by creating a fresh ticket for our team to promptly work on and respond to. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Thank you,
sys_email_canned_message.sys_name: “Any supplier ticket/ last email to a supplier” while resolving needs to have the below note:
